variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 1.400% on the portion of income up to $20,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 1.750% on the portion of income over $20,000 up to $50,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 2.450% on the portion of income over $50,000 up to $70,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 3.500% on the portion of income over $70,000 up to $80,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 5.525% on the portion of income over $80,000 up to $150,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 6.370% on the portion of income over $150,000 up to $500,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 8.970% on the portion of income over $500,000 up to $1,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_8
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 8: 10.750% on the portion of income over $1,000,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_8 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all eight brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
